title: BRIEF-Marathon Announces A $20.1 Mln Bought Deal Private Placement
text:
BRIEF-Marathon Announces A $20.1 Mln Bought Deal Private Placement

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Sep 06, 2019 08:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Marathon Announces A $20.1 Mln Bought Deal Private Placement Sept 6 (Reuters) - Marathon Gold Corp : * MARATHON ANNOUNCES A $20,061,500 BOUGHT DEAL PRIVATE PLACEMENT * MARATHON GOLD CORP - INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING TO CONTINUE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOPMENT OF VALENTINE LAKE GOLD PROJECT * MARATHON GOLD -UNDERWRITERS TO PURCHASE 2.7 MILLION FLOW-THROUGH UNITS AT C$1.85 PER UNIT & 11.4 MILLION COMMON SHARE UNITS AT C$1.32 PER UNIT

BRIEF-Marathon Announces A $20.1 Mln Bought Deal Private Placement
description: BRIEF-Marathon Announces A $20.1 Mln Bought Deal Private Placement
